title: LLM Config E2E: Provider switch + LM Studio mode
details: Switch provider, set model/base URL, set LM Studio mode chat/completions, persist and reload.

title: LLM Generate E2E: success + empty response + tool-call blocking
details: Mock success response, handle empty response error toast, verify tool-call requires confirmation for admin.

title: Notifications E2E: success/error toasts
details: Verify toast renders for success/error flows and disappears after duration.

title: Settings E2E: config load/save + validation
details: Load config JSON, edit/save, verify persistence and validation errors.

title: Agent Panel E2E: propose/execute + logs
details: Propose command, execute, verify logs and output.

title: Audit Logs E2E: pagination and filtering
details: Load audit logs, verify paging and entries after actions.

title: Permissions E2E: admin vs user restrictions
details: Ensure non-admin cannot create/delete templates, roles, or team types; UI disables controls.

title: SSE Events E2E: system events stream
details: Subscribe to events endpoint; verify keepalive and event rendering.

title: Agent Registration E2E: worker registration
details: Register agent via hub, verify appears in agents list.
